website_summaries.verdict: Quality gift bags that will cut down on your gift wrapping – you'll be glad to have these on hand when generosity strikes.
pros: Classic themes and attractive colors make these bags perfect for almost any occasion or recipient
Each bag in this 8-piece set has reinforced handles, making this easy to carry
3 other options to choose from, too
Hallmark is the most trusted name in gifts
cons: Handles can rip off, especially if the bags are heavy or too full
Some think the designs are kind of boring

customer_reviews.title: Love this set of bags! Pretty and highly reccomend!
customer_reviews.text: I brought these bags for my moms birthdaypresents. And I loved all 3 designs. Plus the bonus is it comes with thick pink tissue paper AND an inside pocket to put your card in. I cant rave enough about this set of bags. So pretty!!
customer_reviews.author: Dimplezz

customer_reviews.title: Cant beat the price
customer_reviews.text: These bags are just like you would find in a drug store, great quality for a really low price!
customer_reviews.author: harleydakota

customer_reviews.title: Great bags
customer_reviews.text: perfect for my occasion and I can see where they would be good for ANY occasion
customer_reviews.author: MyM

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality bags
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t have high expectations for a “set” of bags but I was wrong. These bags are VERY high quality and sturdy and cute! Would totally buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Carla M.

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!!!
customer_reviews.text: You get great value for your money. The bags are great quality and look much better in person! Not cheap quality at all!
customer_reviews.author: Asia Cato

customer_reviews.title: Paper material but cute
customer_reviews.text: Super cute designs. They are made of paper and I think may rip easy. They are also on the small size.
customer_reviews.author: jenhinkle521

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I expected
customer_reviews.text: These gift bags came in quickly and are a great addition to my wrapping box. They are all great medium sized or small bags. The print is great. They are a little thin, but that’s pretty common. Satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Aundrea

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality, great value, and nice variety!
customer_reviews.text: Very well made. Beautiful colors and assortment of designs and sizes.
customer_reviews.author: Elina L.

customer_reviews.title: Variety of sizes and designs
customer_reviews.text: These are handy to have for gifts for any occasion.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy

customer_reviews.title: Glitter on bags
customer_reviews.text: The description does not say there is glitter on the bags and there is on one side of some of the bags. Nice otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: outside

customer_reviews.title: Bag torn on delivery
customer_reviews.text: One of the 8 bags came with an obvious tear in it. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Shee

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: these are great & looks great. so glad I made the purchase
customer_reviews.author: Henry Lew

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking bags!
customer_reviews.text: The quality is good. Very attractive as a gift bag.
customer_reviews.author: Elina

customer_reviews.title: You won't be disappointed. Trust me.
customer_reviews.text: These bags are beautiful and durable and the bonus of having coordinated colour tissue inserts that are thick and well made. Your sister , wife, friend or daughter will be happy. I will buy again. ❤️
customer_reviews.author: NikCharUz

customer_reviews.title: Bargain for the price
customer_reviews.text: Love these gift bags....strong, easy to work with and pretty
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Richman

customer_reviews.title: High quality assortment that does not disappoint
customer_reviews.text: This Hallmark Gift Bags Assortment pack of 8 assorted gift bags are high quality and sport cute and elegant designs in keeping with this brand's high standards. I am never disappointed with Hallmark cards, wraps, or gift bags.
customer_reviews.author: R. Eye

customer_reviews.title: Lovely bags
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice collection of gift bags of varying sizes. With our toddler's friends birthdays in the summer, This is a must buy for us.
customer_reviews.author: M. Wanchoo

customer_reviews.title: Better than...
customer_reviews.text: Better than the dollar store... but how important is that? You decide. If you want nice quality gift bags hit add to cart.. you found them.
customer_reviews.author: David S.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty, but not my taste
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting an assortment of eight gift bags but I received one bag with matching tissue paper as shown in my photograph, so that’s what I’m reviewing. The bag measures 10.5 x 10.5 x 5.0. It’s sturdy and attractive. Inside there’s a pocket with the Signature logo, which is meant for a Signature greeting card. The metallic looking pineapple is attached securely and looks pretty, but I personally would not choose this design. If you’re looking for a bag for a housewarming or hostess gift this might appeal to you.
customer_reviews.author: ocmd

customer_reviews.title: great smaller bag set
customer_reviews.text: I don't understand Halmark's bag sizes. What they call large seems like a smaller medium. Take a look at the sizes before ordering! That being said, they're really good quality bags. Most of the patterns in the set I got are girly, but that works for us since four of our five kids are girls. We've used a number of these and like them a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and design
customer_reviews.text: Love the unique colors, images and variety on these festive bags. Great value to have on hand! Love the vibrant colors and generally-appealing design. Love that it comes with its own corresponding tissue. Not super big, though. Do check the dimensions in the product description to ensure you're getting the size you need.
customer_reviews.author: Oliver DeMille, TJEd

customer_reviews.title: A variety of... one bag
customer_reviews.text: One bag in the package with an embossed pineapple on it, which is nice work but... Excellent bag design incorporates a greeting card envelop into the inside with matching paper and lining that is gorgeous. SOMEBODY designed a bag that is probably going to be loved as much or more than what's in it!
customer_reviews.author: By Mark Braun

customer_reviews.title: Super helpful to have around
customer_reviews.text: I always need these for parties and birthdays and toting things around and sending things with kids and of course never have them on hand when I need them. Glad to buy a multipack that can be used for lots of different occasions. Good quality, affordable, cute. Very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: good value
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice assortment of gift bags that can be used for many different occasions. The set is much more convenient than going out and buying them one by one and is a good value as well. I do wish some tissue paper was included for convenience but it’s still a nice set.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

product_meta.title: Hallmark Gift Bags Assortment, Floral, Stripes, Polka Dots, Solids (Pack of 8: 4 Large 13" and 4 Medium 9") for Birthdays, Mother's Day, Baby Showers, Bridal Showers, Any Occasion
product_meta.description: Color:Floral, Stripes, Polka Dots Gift Bag Bundle, Pack of 8This bundle of cheerful gift bags is perfect for celebrating everyday occasions and special events with friends and family. Eight bags each feature their own unique design, and two different sizes make all your gifting as easy as possible. Medium bags measure 7.75" x 9.6" x 4.3" and can support up to 3 pounds, large bags 10.47" x 13" x 5.75" and up to 8 pounds. The Hallmark brand is widely recognized as the very best for greeting cards, gift wrap, and more. For more than 100 years, Hallmark has been helping its customers make everyday moments more beautiful and celebrations more joyful.
feature_bullets: This eight-count set of assorted gift bags contains four large and four medium bags, great for all kinds of gift-giving needs.
Wrap a variety of gifts, big and small. Assorted sizes fit everything from accessories and jewelry up to stuffed animals, puzzles, or clothing. Full bag measurements in product description below.
Paper gift bags with stiff woven handles feature eight unique designs in solid colors, polka dots, stripes, and floral patterns.

With two sizes and eight designs, this assorted gift bag bundle makes cheerful, varied gift presentation easy for celebrations like Mother's Day, birthday parties, an anniversary, engagements, bridal showers, baby showers, and weddings, or everyday special moments.
Crafted from high-quality paper materials, Hallmark's eco-friendly gift bags are made with paper from well-managed forests.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars221 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
